imdb.plot outline: "A SINGLE GIRLS SHOW," is the world from one girls perspective. An alternate reality where the economy hasn't crashed, elections haven't been stolen, where quarters are carried to make phone calls. It's the world she always envisioned growing int: a real life 90s TV show. However, one can't run away from today forever, and this Single Girl, her friends, and her family must learn how to marry the hopes of their pasts with the realities of the present. But, until they do, at least they get to play a lot of pogs and Super Mario along the way.
imdb.title: A Single Girls Show
plot: It's your world, see it how you want.::Sassy Mohen

"A SINGLE GIRLS SHOW," is the world from one girls perspective. An alternate reality where the economy hasn't crashed, elections haven't been stolen, where quarters are carried to make phone calls. It's the world she always envisioned growing int: a real life 90s TV show. However, one can't run away from today forever, and this Single Girl, her friends, and her family must learn how to marry the hopes of their pasts with the realities of the present. But, until they do, at least they get to play a lot of pogs and Super Mario along the way.::Sassy Mohen
